mapper.insert: insert into member(member_code, member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_birth, member_phone, member_email, pw_question, pw_answer, member_start) values(member_seq.nextval, #{member_id},#{member_pw},#{member_name},#{member_birth},#{member_phone},#{member_email},#{pw_question},#{pw_answer},sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_id = #{member_id}
